Starling forces

Starling forces (see diffusion ).

Net fluid movement = k[(P c -P i )-σ(π c -π i )]

k = filtration coefficient - a measure of membrane permeability to water .

P c /P i = hydrostatic pressure in capillary/interstitium

π c /π i = colloid oncotic pressure in capillary/interstitium

σ = reflection coefficient - a measure of membrane permeability to proteins . Why? xxx

[Starling, E.H. J Physiol. 19 , 312-326(1896).]
